description.value: This plugin allows for any command to be executed via SSH on any specified remote host as an Incident Action

property.label: Remote Host
property.description: Hostname (or IP Address) of remote host where SSH service is running and specified command will be executed.

property.label: Use Key Based Authentication?
property.description: Select if you would like to use key-based authentication as opposed to username:password.

property.label: username
property.description: Username of user to be used for SSH authentication

property.label: Key Location
property.description: Location of the key to be used for authentciation

property.label: Command
property.description: The command string to be executed on the specified remote host.
